meaningMnemonic: This is a strange looking axe, I know. But think of it this way: the letter "T" is in the cliff. What is the "T"? Of course it has to be Mr. T, who's super awesome. Think of Mr. T wielding a terrifying axe, running after you screaming, "I pity the fool!" while trying to chop you down. That makes for a pretty terrifying <radical>axe</radical>.
